page.title: Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Development (Poland)

{{Infobox Government agency |agency_name = Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Development of the
Polish Republic |nativename = Ministerstwo Rolnictwa i Rozwoju Wsi Rzeczypospolitej Polskiej |logo = Logo ministerstwa rolnictwa i rozwoju wsi.jpg |logo_width = 100px |logo_caption = Ministerial logotype |seal = Polish Governmental and Diplomatic Plaque.png |seal_width = 150px |seal_caption = Official governmental wall plaque |formed = |preceding1 = |preceding2 = |jurisdiction = |headquarters = ul. WspÃ³lna 30, [[Warsaw]] |employees = |budget = |chief1_name = [[Marek Sawicki]] |chief1_position = Minister of Agriculture and Rural Development |chief2_name = |chief2_position = First Deputy Minister |parent_agency = [[Council of Ministers of the Republic of Poland|Council of Ministers]] |website = [http://www.minrol.gov.pl/ www.minrol.gov.pl] |footnotes = }} [[Image:Ministry of Agriculture Warsaw.jpg|250px|thumb|Building of the Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Development]] [[Image:Ministry of Agriculture Warsaw4.jpg|250px|thumb|One of the entrances to the Ministry's main building]] '''Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Development of the Republic of Poland''' ({{lang-pl|Ministerstwo Rolnictwa i Rozwoju Wsi}}) was formed on October 1999, from transformation of ''Ministry of Agriculture and Food Economy of Poland''; the ministry can trace its history to 1944. The Ministry's 1999 incarnation was because development of rural regions was Poland's greatest political, economic, and social challenge that was uncontested by both coalition and opposition politicians.[http://www.ce-review.org/99/11/best11_hermann.html Hermann, Rudolf "Ready for the Chop" Central Europe Review, Vol 1, No 11, 6 September 1999], retrieved on 17 December 2007. The ministry is concerned with various aspects of Polish [[agriculture]] and improving its [[rural]] areas. Current minister is [[Marek Sawicki]]. ==List of ministers== ===Minsters of Agriculture in communist Poland (1944-1989)=== {{Empty section|date=November 2008}} ===Ministers of Agriculture and Food Economy (1989-1999)=== {| class="wikitable" |- !No. !Name !Term of Offices !Party !Served under |- |1 |[[CzesÅaw Janicki]] |20 December 1989 -
